House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08315
FULL TITLE : AN ACT STRENGTHENING THE BARANGAYS THROUGH SUPPORT FOR BARANGAY OFFICIALS AND VOLUNTEER WORKERS
ABSTRACT : Seeks to provide additional benefits to Barangay officials and volunteer workers by increasing their honorariums and granting them additional incentives and benefits like retirement benefits, training and workshops, and free legal service to properly compensate and equip barangay officials with necessary training and enable them to efficiently and effectively carry out their mandated tasks.
ALIAS NAME : “Barangay Officials and Volunteer Workers Incentives and Benefits Act of 2018.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CALIXTO-RUBIANO, EMI G.
DATE FILED : 2018-10-01
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
